title: Riven Buff - Thank you, about time
body:
Riven is so weak early game its not even funny. tell me one opponent she can face straighg up 1v1 that wont destroy her /zone her pre 6??? I main riven i know the hardships, a super split second shield means u had better time it absolutely well. a Q that does 10(+30ish) dmg lvl 1 is laughable since u will b using it to gap close. so to all those saying that for her to be able to fast combo is too massive a buff must not b riven mains. good for u if u can auto-q-move theb righg click back onto target. i cant tell u how many autos i have canceled trying the "fast combo" and when u dont try fast combo then u better disregard any sort of Burst it takes forever. no other champ in the game suffers from such an awful mechanic. most champs may have a skill that resets auto attack . kool. and so dods riven except if u keep ur mouse on the target and q auto q auto ur in for a lengthy time frame to use your rotations of skills. 

thank you riot i hope u dont listen to the other riven mains who believe that this mechanic is all their is to this champ. i mean i cant think of any other champion being thought of as such a buggy mechanic. i tell u the trith u will cancel so many autos or clicka minion trying to fast combo that this will indeed make her far more viable. thanks again

replies.body: This is not a buff. This is a QoL change for people who have not mastered Riven. This changes literally nothing for good Rivens who still can't really play Riven because of the meta.

ill leave it at this. if they go thru with this it will make rivens skill rotations comsistant, so as to not be limited by a quite strange mechanic/bug. 

every riven player will b able to combo at same dps. is a good thing jn my book.

http://youtu.be/0qO715z_OKk fast combo(buggy bs) vs normal combo


u guys r sorely mistaken. you can animation cancel her autos with Q. but you can cancel her Q animation with right click move. so what this means is unlike any other champion,  bcuz someone who has high clicks per minute will outdamage someone who does not. i cant think of any other champion that a bronze player doing a combo with that a challenger player can do more damage. lets take renekton for example, lets say level 1 u have Q and hydra, sure u can cancel sum animation with hydra but with riven a slow lumbering q auto q auto compared to a q move auto repeat is a huge difference . i dont think people understand what this change is , even if unintended. canceling ur auto animation is fine with q however the buggy mechanic of canceling q animation gives riven a unique buggy mechanic that simply means your dps is calculated on how fast u can click.

Um... you do understand that the changes to riven were not intended and last I checked still in limbo for actually sticking around.

You did know that you could also already do this in game if you are really good with riven or setting up a macro.
It's not a buggy mechanic. Animation cancelling is in Dota and in every fucking fighting game. {{champion:32}}
